data.title: Black Humour in Serbian Films of The Early Eighties and Its Cultural Consequences
data.meta_description:
Black Humour in Serbian Films of the Early Eighties and Its Cultural Consequences - Read online for free. MA Dissertation. School of History of Art, Film and Visual Media, Birkbeck College, University of London, 2005. Tutor: Prof. Laura Mulvey. 
Examining the dark heart of laughter. and the symbiotic relationship film has with its audiences, how it wires us to think and talk in certain ways, its cultural impact, and its myriad semiotic and cinematic legacies - specifically, four films, and two filmmakers – Slobodan Šijan and Dušan Kovačević. 
Keywords: black humour, Serbian cinema, spectatorship.
data.text: Black Humour in Serbian Films of The Early Eighties and Its Cultural Consequences
